Package: org.grails.plugin.jcaptcha

[Groovy] Class JcaptchaService

    • org.grails.plugin.jcaptcha.JcaptchaService

    • Provides access to the captchas as well as provides some util type methods to convert captchas to usable data.

      Authors:
      LD

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.Object  grailsApplication
          Used to access the captchas defined as part of the app config.

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          JcaptchaService ()

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          byte[] challengeAsJpeg(java.awt.image.BufferedImage challenge)
          Utility routine to turn an image challenge into a JPEG stream.
          byte[] challengeAsWav(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream challenge)
          Utility routine to turn a sound challenge into a WAV stream.
          com.octo.captcha.service.CaptchaService getCaptchaService(java.lang.String captchaName)
          Retrieves a captcha by name.

          Used to verify the response to a challenge.

      • Constructor Detail

        • JcaptchaService()

      • Method Detail

        • byte[] challengeAsJpeg(java.awt.image.BufferedImage challenge)

          Utility routine to turn an image challenge into a JPEG stream.

          Parameters:
          challenge - The image data
          Returns:
          A raw bunch of bytes which come together to be a JPEG.

        • byte[] challengeAsWav(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream challenge)

          Utility routine to turn a sound challenge into a WAV stream.

          Parameters:
          challenge - The sound data
          Returns:
          A raw bunch of bytes which come together to be a WAV.

        • com.octo.captcha.service.CaptchaService getCaptchaService(java.lang.String captchaName)

          Retrieves a captcha by name.

          throws:
          IllegalArgumentException If captchaName is null.
          throws:
          IllegalStateException If there is no captcha by that name.
          returns:
          The captcha service keyed by 'captchaName'
          Parameters:
          captchaName - The 'key' of the captcha defined in config.

        • boolean validateResponse(java.lang.Object captchaName, java.lang.Object id, java.lang.Object response)

          Used to verify the response to a challenge.

          Parameters:
          captchaName - The key of the captcha
          id - The identifier used when retrieving the challenge (often session.id)
          response - What the user 'entered' to meet the challenge
          Returns:
          True if the response meets the challenge
          See Also:
          getCaptchaService()
